Countries where suicide is illegal

```{r}
illegal <- death_rate_from_suicides_gho <- read_csv("data/branch2/death-rate-from-suicides-gho.csv") %>% 
  filter(Entity %in% c("Bahamas", "Bangladesh", "Guyana", "Ghana", "Kenya", "Malawi", "Malaysia", "Myanmar", "Nigeria", "Pakistan", "Papua New Guinea", "Qatar", "Saint Lucia", "Somalia", "South Sudan", "Sudan", "Tanzania", "Tonga", "Uganda", "Brunei"))
```

```{r}
unique(illegal$Entity)
```

```{r}
colnames(illegal)
```


```{r}
ggplot(illegal, aes(colour=Entity, y= `Age-standardized suicide rate - Sex: both sexes`, x=Year))+
  geom_line()
```
